item.description:
Let's get together for an outdoor concert overlooking scenic Padanaram Harbor.  A perfect hump day getaway and only $5.  This concert is part of the Dartmouth Park Departments Summer Concert series.   Kids are welcome.  There is room to play with 2 playgrounds, volleyball and basketball courts. Bring a picnic dinner and a bottle of wine (or what have you) if you would like. We usually get there around 6ish set up chairs, blankets and the concert starts around 6:30.  There is plenty of parking.  A terrific place to catch the sunset too!      

    The Funky White Honkies are a sixteen-piece band that will bring with them an explosion of Rock and R&B. With a multitude of horns, drums and vocals,  they have been described as more of a "tribe" than a band made up of some of New Englands finest music veterans. They're a very energetic bunch that loves to get everyone up on their feet and dancing! 

     The legendary Oxford Creamery runs "The Bucket" at Apponagansett Park and serves seafood, burgers, dogs etc. and, of course, ice cream. 

     Raindate for the concert is June 30th.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll figure that out and send an email to all who RSVP.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Waterfront concert Funky White Honkies @ Apponagansett Park in Dartmouth
